unnormalised: Hey everyone! Training regimens are fascinating. I remember Dr. Sharma at NIS, Patiala, swearing by high-intensity interval training. My cousin, Rohan, trains for marathons using a plan he found online – he runs about 50 km a week! He's even built a home gym in his 200 sq ft balcony in Mumbai. Costs him a fortune in Rs., but says it's worth it! What are your favourite training methods?
